snippet: The politically charged shortlist for Oxford Dictionaries’ international word of the year also included “Brexiteer,” “glass cliff” and “woke.”...
abstract: Oxford Dictionaries names 'post-truth' as 2016 international word of the year.
lead_paragraph: The politically charged shortlist for Oxford Dictionaries’ international word of the year also included “Brexiteer,” “glass cliff” and “woke.”

headline.main: ‘Post-Truth’ Defeats ‘Alt-Right’ as Oxford’s Word of the Year
headline.print_headline: The Word of the Year: Can You Believe It?
